document_data.mainbody:
awleigh Gallaway was the individual who ran the Gallaway Trading Coaster and traveled through Lonelywood, in the early 14 century DR.
In his young days, Rawleigh was a fair-skinned human man with dark brown hair.
In the , Rawleigh Gallaway ran caravans for his fathers trading coaster and ended up being stuck in the town of Lonelywood when Bremens Run became cut off by barbarian forces of chieftain Wylfdene. Subsequently, Rawleigh, along with other family members, took over Gallaway Trading Coaster after Rawleighs father, Ilmus Gallaway, was unable to be in charge due to his age and love of Cormyrian brandy. In the , Rawleigh still ran the family business. As a "one last favor," Rawleigh requested his trusted adviser and employee, Jemeliah, to lend his expertise and sharp mind to Deirdre Gallaway in Targos, who strove to prove herself as a capable businesswoman and merchant.
